name: Devil Ravana Pro
description: Celebrate this festival season with the great epic Ramayana. Kill the terrible devil king Ravana along with his family including Kumbhkaran, Meghnath, Akshaykumara and Surpankha. Play this interesting shooting game with challenging 5 harder levels and destroy the demons and their army. Each level has Rakshas and a member from Ravana’s family. It is a time base game requires quick action and strategy to complete the level. Experience a win over devil by killing various Rakshas in various stages and become the great warrior in this epic action game.
